1.name: Navudohodonosor
1.description: The Bombay cat is a short-haired breed of domestic cat. Bombays are glossy solid black cats with a muscular build, and have characteristic large bright copper-golden eyes.

2.name: Pretty Kitty
2.description: Bengals are domestic cats with vivid spots or distinctive marbling, which are equally beautiful.

3.name: Sarrah
3.description: American Bobtails are a very sturdy breed, with both short- and long-haired coats. Their coat is shaggy rather than dense or fluffy.
